description: Presidential Secretariat - Appointed Hon. Ranil Wickramasinghe MP as the Minister of Policy Planning etc. & 27 other Ministers w.e.f. 12.01.2015. Appointed Hon. Nandimithra Ekanayake MP as the State Minister of Culture & 09 other Ministers w.e.f. 12.01.2015. Appointed Hon. Dunesh Gankanda MP as Deputy Ministers of Urban Development, Water Supply & Drainage & 08 other Deputy Ministers w.e.f. 12.01.2015.
